name: Malvern Institute for Psychiatric and Alcoholic Studies Inc.

narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Malvern Institute for Psychiatric and Alcoholic Studies Inc. is a Special Hospital provider based in Malvern, PA. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $91.7M in Medicaid payments across 38K claims serving 0 beneficiaries.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $91.7M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
